Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Scarab
Description: Well defined scarab (head and clypeus represented, two lateral incisions indicating the prothorax, legs also depicted).  The flat surface is engraved with the title, well-known during the Middle Kingdom, of the scribe Redi-Ptah.
